snippet: Stéphane Richard, the chief executive of France Télécom, is being investigated on suspicion of organized fraud, according to the Paris prosecutor’s office.
abstract: French prosecutors say Stephane Richard, chief executive of France Telecom, will be formally investigated for his role in politically charged case that has already shined uncomfortable spotlight on his former boss Christine Lagarde, managing director of International Monetary Fund; he is being investigated on suspicion of organized fraud.
lead_paragraph: Stéphane Richard, the chief executive of France Télécom, is being investigated on suspicion of organized fraud, according to the Paris prosecutor’s office.

headline.main: Chief Executive Linked to I.M.F. Official Faces Inquiry
headline.print_headline:
France: Chief Executive Linked
To I.M.F. Official Faces Inquiry
